channel.title: [HELP] RSCAngel Website
channel.description:
Ok, i got my website setup with the rscd.sql and i can register, but when i register it trys loading somebody elses ip, and it wont load, so then i have to go back to http://localhost and it registered my character, but it tries to redirect to another ip, how do i fix this?
And when i go to make my character a admin on forums i get this error.
Error: Unable to fetch reports info.
please help

item.title: [HELP] RSCAngel Website
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Stunninhigh, post:1, topic:405588”]Ok, i got my website setup with the rscd.sql and i can register, but when i register it trys loading somebody elses ip, and it wont load, so then i have to go back to http://localhost and it registered my character, but it tries to redirect to another ip, how do i fix this?

And when i go to make my character a admin on forums i get this error.

Error: Unable to fetch reports info.

please help[/quote]
go to localhost/phpmyadmin and go to the config table, and change the website address from there, and also delete contents of the cache folder. Or another way would be to go to the cache folder and change it there, tho it’s only temp I think.

Read full topic
